segments.text: Welcome . How can we be of service today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . My aunt in the US has sent me $ 500 . She sent it yesterday , using the standard service . It's my birthday today , you see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , happy birthday . If it was sent yesterday using the usual service , it should be here already . You do have an account with us , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Here's my card . Do you need my ID ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please . Just to double check all the details .
segments.speaker: S1
